title: JSON-UI
description: JSON-UI is a JSON-based declarative schema for describing user interfaces, use with JSON-Schema to describe data structures and JSON-UI to describe the user interface for the data structure.

label.description: The label of the data model, use an array of localized strings to support multiple languages.

description.description: The description of the data model, use an array of localized strings to support multiple languages.

messages.description: The messages of the data model, use an array of message objects to support multiple messages.

code.description: The code of the message, use a dot notation to separate the code into parts, e.g. 'error.name.required'.

type.description: The type of the message, use one of the following values: message, error, warn, info, success.

content.description: The content of the message, use an array of localized strings to support multiple languages.

component.description: The component to use to render the data model, if not specified the component is inferred from the data model.

lang.description: The language of the string, use RFC 5646 language tags, e.g. pt-BR, en-US, en-GB, fr-FR, etc.

content.description: The localized content of the string.
